title: Trolley school helps Philippine children keep studies on track
description: A brightly decorated wooden trolley rumbles down a little-used rail track in the southern Philippines carrying four young teachers, two on the front and two in the back pushing it along with their feet.
content: TAGKAWAYAN, Philippines, Feb 23 (Reuters) - A brightly decorated wooden trolley rumbles down a little-used rail track in the southern Philippines carrying four young teachers, two on the front and twâ€¦ [+2223 chars]
